attributes.action: Make Santander cycles free to the public/workers for safe transport to work
attributes.additional_details: We need to minimize use of public transport in London as soon much as possible, which funciton as hot spots for transmition and contagion. Especially healthcare professionals that need to get to work have to be given the option of safe transport
attributes.background: Make them free during the crisis so whoever needs to transport will do so in a safe way rather than using public transports.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of TfL and the Greater London Authority.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
